Author.0: Sina Truckenbrodt (1, 2), Maximilian Enderling (2) & Diego Leiva CÃ¡ceres (3) | 1 - Friedrich Schiller University Jena, Institute of Geography, Earth Observation | 2 - German Aerospace Center (DLR) Jena, Institute of Data Science, Citizen Science | 3 - Institute of Biology, University of Graz

Description.0: This is a project to collect parameters that characterize crypogamic covers in the earth system. Organisms that can be studied within this project are bryophytes, cyanobacteria, and lichens. This tool allows for a fast and precise sample data collection, especially on the microscale, if a dGNSS sensor (like the ZED-F9P RTK GNSS USB Dongle (from u-blox, GNSS OEM Future World) with an ANN-MB-Antenna) is connected the mobile device (e.g., tablet or smartphone).
